name: Mark R
text: I just moved from Charlotte, NC to Melbourne, FL. In Charlotte I ate at Hungry Howie's all the time and it is one of my favorite pizza places, it was always perfect and wonderful and I was so excited there was a location here in Melbourne. â€¦More

name: Vance Brown
text: Order online with the coupons/specials from the website and you get really good deals for good pizza.

name: David Richardson
text: I don't like to leave a bad review of a business but the pizza was not very good 7 of us all agreed. Got 2 large go, we were 10 minutes from the house. When we got home the pizza was just warm. I think they were pre made.

name: Lee Sobieck
text: We enjoyed the food. The price is good and is a good quick meal. It doesn't claim to be a fancy restaurant.

name: b c
text: This was only my second time ordering from your establishment. And I must say, that I am amazed with the quality, as well as the prices. And the only reason I gave 4-stars, and not 5, is because I've only order from you twice. I'm ordered from from you enough to give 5-stars,.. yet. (I'm originally from Ohio)

name: Destynee Diaz
text: Ever since it went under new ownership some time ago it has been a bad experience. I love hungry howies, and while the pizza is still good the new ownership doesn't like to work. He got rid of the employee's closes early all the time and they either don't answer the phone and times it's busy for days. He is shady.

name: ken perez
text: Ordered Greek salad no feta with additional toppings. Got Greek salad with feta. Called back and they said they would send out another salad no feta. Sent second salad with feta and none of the additional toppings requested. When we called â€¦More

name: Kris Nogler
text: I am visiting my family in Melbourne and we had this for a quick supper.. I barely ate any of it.. The salad was not that bad but the pizza was worse than any snack bar pizza even.. Not a fan

name: Jeremiah Mackey
text: Affordable pizza with great flavored crust.

name: Jason Hawi
text: The pizza pie was awesome, it's interesting that you can get different flavors for it making it unique receipe to themselves

name: Mike Carpenter
text: 1 guy working.. u did good brother!

name: Jac V
text: Love Hungry Howies better than any other place, so I came to order. But the door is locked at 5 pm. With bills stuck in the handle. Wow! Just wow.

name: Zackary F
text: Had ordered for delivery set this location prior without issue and yet they would not deliver to my apartment today because the delivery driver didn't feel like going out that far. He and his manager spoke audibly enough that I heard this â€¦More

name: Lidia Skibba
text: By far the best pizza around here. very clean inside. Pizza is always done just right. The new owners are very nice! Staff are on top of things.  Walked in ordered a pizza she told me 10 mins and I went and sat in my car came back in in 10 â€¦More

name: Nancy Dahle
text: I love the pizza here the price is right and the people are super friendly

name: Karyn carroll

name: Elizabeth Juliano

name: Christina Silva
text: I prefer hungry hours over other pizza places and their salads are awesome

name: David Johnston
text: They closed early before and havent found too many offers, but the order is always correct and the pizza is good .

name: Leigh Cholette Blattler
text: Great price and the crust is awesome but lately they've been over cooking your pizza not sure what's up with the oven

name: steven schulz
text:
I just got off the phone with them. The conversation went as follows;

Them: "Hungry Howie's, can you please hold?" â€¦More

name: Lindsey Gruszkowski
text: This was the worst take out pizza experience I've ever had. We ordered a large cheese pizza with extra sauce and garlic butter crust. They said on the phone it would be 10-15min. I got there at 15min. To wait another 10. Not a huge deal. I â€¦More

name: The mixed Nation
text: Nice delicious greasy pizza and sub sandwiches I love it

name: Paul Kerkman
text: Been here twice in the past week for walk in and 7 mins later my food was ready and delicious.

text: Orderd online. Took my money, got there to pick, location was closed.

name: Ashley Kammer
text: i orderd a junior pizza this afternoon and asked for cajun and it said on the recipet cajun and the pizza had absolutely zero flavoring on the pizza. very unhappy

name: wayne glubiak
text: I went to the Hungry Howies  on Wickham and post on 8/18/14 at about 12:15 PM. I waited for tTEN minutes, the person there had seen me when I came in the store. After a full ten minute wait to give my order without any acknowledge by the employee I left.
